name: 3D Brick Buster for Raspberry Pi
description:
Welcome back to a classic paddle-battle game. Destroy the all the bricks to advance to the next level. Use your 'launch pad' to hit the ball. Catch falling 'bonus' pieces to gain different powers. Beware! Enemy robots float around the board and make the game more difficult. The falling bonus pieces make the game exciting. Catch the falling objects with your paddle to active it. Remember, not every falling piece is good to get!

Features

  • 30 amazing levels
  • Power-ups
  • High-score table
  • Super addicting game-play
  • Cool soundtrack
